title: Spotlight Talk: Sarcophagus Depicting the Abduction of Persephone
hero_caption: <p>Roman, <em>Fragment of a Sarcophagus Depicting the Abduction of Persephone</em>, A.D. 190/200. Private Collection.</p>
short_description: 30-minute talk about an artwork in the collection
list_description: 30-minute talk about an artwork in the collection
description:
Join us for a special 30-minute look at a treasured artwork in the Art Institute's collection.

To request an accessibility accommodation for an Art Institute program, please call (312) 443-3680 or send an e-mail to access@artic.edu as far in advance as possible.
